dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Alright, so we've got the latest from Kazhydromet, and it looks like Astana and Almaty are in for quite the mixed bag this week.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Alright, so we've got the latest from Kazhydromet, and it looks like Astana and Almaty are in for quite the mixed bag this week.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Kazhydromet meteorologists have shared the weather forecast for Astana and Almaty for the upcoming three days " from June 27 to 29.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Oh, here we go. I mean, it's always an adventure, isn't it? What's the deal for the next few days, specifically?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Oh, here we go. I mean, it's always an adventure, isn't it? What's the deal for the next few days, specifically?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, exactly! So, for Astana, uh, Wednesday, June 27th, we're looking at partly cloudy skies with some showers and thunderstorms. Temperatures will be around 21 to 23 degrees Celsius during the day. Cool and rainy, basically.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, exactly! So, for Astana, uh, Wednesday, June twenty seventh, we're looking at partly cloudy skies with some showers and thunderstorms. Temperatures will be around twenty one to twenty three degrees Celsius during the day. Cool and rainy, basically.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: June 27: Partly cloudy skies are expected in the capital, with occasional showers and thunderstorms. Winds will shift from the northeast to the southeast at 9"14 m/s. Temperatures will range from +12¦+14ÂC at night to +21¦+23ÂC during the day. Cool and rainy conditions will persist.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Ugh, cool and rainy. Not exactly summer vibes, huh? What about Thursday?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Ugh, cool and rainy. Not exactly summer vibes, huh? What about Thursday?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Thursday, the 28th, sees a slight warm-up in Astana. We're talking 25 to 27 degrees. Still partly cloudy, scattered showers, maybe some thunderstorms. So, you know, warmer, but definitely keep that umbrella handy.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Thursday, the twenty eighth, sees a slight warm-up in Astana. We're talking twenty five to twenty seven degrees. Still partly cloudy, scattered showers, maybe some thunderstorms. So, you know, warmer, but definitely keep that umbrella handy.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: June 28: Partly cloudy with scattered short-term showers and possible thunderstorms. Southeast winds at 9"14 m/s. Temperatures will rise slightly to +13¦+15ÂC at night and +25¦+27ÂC during the day. It™ll be warmer, but keep an umbrella handy.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: [chuckles] An umbrella, always. And then Friday?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: An umbrella, always. And then Friday?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Friday, the 29th, the temperatures dip again after that brief warm-up. Back down to 20-22 degrees, with more rain and thunderstorms expected. So, a bit of a rollercoaster for Astana.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Friday, the twenty ninth, the temperatures dip again after that brief warm-up. Back down to twenty to twenty two degrees, with more rain and thunderstorms expected. So, a bit of a rollercoaster for Astana.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: June 29: Rain and thunderstorms are expected again. Winds will shift to the southwest at 9"14 m/s. Temperatures will dip again, with +13¦+15ÂC at night and +20¦+22ÂC during the day. After a brief warm-up, temperatures are set to drop again.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Okay, rollercoaster for Astana. What about Almaty, though? That's usually where the heat's at, right?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Okay, rollercoaster for Astana. What about Almaty, though? That's usually where the heat's at, right?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: You got it. Almaty on Wednesday, the 27th, is partly cloudy with isolated showers and thunderstorms, but it'll be a warmer 26 to 28 degrees during the day. Rain bringing some relief after the heat, they say.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: You got it. Almaty on Wednesday, the twenty seventh, is partly cloudy with isolated showers and thunderstorms, but it'll be a warmer twenty six to twenty eight degrees during the day. Rain bringing some relief after the heat, they say.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: June 27: Partly cloudy with isolated showers and thunderstorms. Western winds at 3"8 m/s with gusts up to 14 m/s. Temperatures will be +17¦+19ÂC at night and +26¦+28ÂC during the day. Rain will bring some relief after the heat.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Some relief? Wow, that sounds hot already.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Some relief? Wow, that sounds hot already.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: It does! And Thursday, the 28th, Almaty is set to be *hot*. We're talking 30 to 32 degrees Celsius, even with showers and thunderstorms expected during the day. The heat is definitely returning there.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It does! And Thursday, the twenty eighth, Almaty is set to be hot. We're talking thirty to thirty two degrees Celsius, even with showers and thunderstorms expected during the day. The heat is definitely returning there.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: June 28: Partly cloudy skies, with showers and thunderstorms expected during the day. Northeastern winds at 3"8 m/s, gusting to 13 m/s. Temperatures will be +15¦+17ÂC at night and a hot +30¦+32ÂC during the day. Despite the rain, the heat will return.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Phew, 32 degrees! I mean, that's intense. So, Friday for Almaty?
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Phew, thirty two degrees! I mean, that's intense. So, Friday for Almaty?

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Friday, the 29th, Almaty stays hot, 30 to 32 degrees again. Showers and thunderstorms overnight, and then, you know, the weekend promises heat, although heavy rain is possible at night.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Friday, the twenty ninth, Almaty stays hot, thirty to thirty two degrees again. Showers and thunderstorms overnight, and then, you know, the weekend promises heat, although heavy rain is possible at night.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: June 29: Partly cloudy with showers and thunderstorms expected overnight. Winds will shift from the northeast to the west, at 3"8 m/s with nighttime gusts up to 13 m/s. Temperatures will range from +17¦+19ÂC at night to +30¦+32ÂC during the day. The weekend promises heat, though heavy rain is possible at night.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: So, basically, pack for everything in Almaty. Heat, rain, thunderstorms, um, like all at once.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: So, basically, pack for everything in Almaty. Heat, rain, thunderstorms, um, like all at once.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Pretty much! And just to zoom out a bit, Kazhydromet's overall forecast for June in Kazakhstan? Unstable conditions throughout. We're talking alternating cool and hot spells, heavy rain, thunderstorms, hail, squally winds...
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Pretty much! And just to zoom out a bit, Kazhydromet's overall forecast for June in Kazakhstan? Unstable conditions throughout. We're talking alternating cool and hot spells, heavy rain, thunderstorms, hail, squally winds...
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Unstable conditions are expected throughout the month, alternating between cool and hot spells, accompanied by rain (sometimes heavy), thunderstorms, hail, and squally winds.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, and get this, even dust storms are possible on some days. So, you know, anything goes this month.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, and get this, even dust storms are possible on some days. So, you know, anything goes this month.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: On some days, dust storms are also possible.

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_B
dialogue_turns.text: Right, so "unstable" is the keyword. Thanks for the heads-up on that wild forecast, Host_A!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right, so unstable is the keyword. Thanks for the heads-up on that wild forecast, Host_A!

dialogue_turns.speaker: Host_A
dialogue_turns.text: My pleasure, Host_B. Stay safe out there, everyone!
dialogue_turns.tts_text: My pleasure, Host_B. Stay safe out there, everyone!
